actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in "In Re Sealed Cases".

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in In re Sealed Cases in support of the constitutionality of Title VI of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 (which provides for the appointment, duties, and removal of independent counsels).

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in "In Re Sealed Cases".
